title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\KubernetesSoftwareConfig
name: KubernetesSoftwareConfig
description:
The software configuration for this Dataproc cluster running on Kubernetes.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.KubernetesSoftwareConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.component_version
params.description: The components that should be installed in this Dataproc cluster. The key must be a string from the KubernetesComponent enumeration. The value is the version of the software to be installed. At least one entry must be specified.

params.name: data.properties
params.description: The properties to set on daemon config files. Property keys are specified in prefix:property format, for example spark:spark.kubernetes.container.image. The following are supported prefixes and their mappings: * spark: spark-defaults.conf For more information, see Cluster properties.

methods.name: getComponentVersion
methods.description:
The components that should be installed in this Dataproc cluster. The key must be a string from the KubernetesComponent enumeration. The value is the version of the software to be installed.

At least one entry must be specified.
